title: How long are canned foods good? - Quora

response.answer_text: Way longer than the date on the can. We used a can dated 2016 the other day and it was fine. It depends on the item in the cans and the quality of the product. A few years ago, we opened a can of applesauce that was three years old and the acid in the can affected the taste of the sauce.
When I was in the Navy back in the 60's we ate can food from WWII.
